"Rediah": "I shall now inform you about the \"Shop\"."
"The Shop provides a wide selection of useful items. For example, the \"Premium Set\"."
"That Set serves as a license for you to sell things on your My Shop, and gives you access to Premium Storage."
"The Shop also allows you to obtain Costumes and Accessories from \"Scratch Tickets\"."
"Items obtained from certain Scratch Tickets can be bought and sold on My Shop."
"Incidentally, some items are always available, while some items are periodically switched into and out of rotation."
"Because of this, some items can only be obtained at specified intervals, so make sure to check back every now and then for different item line-ups!"
"First, I'd like you to try browsing the Shop. I'm sure you'll find some items to your liking!"
